Replace your toothpaste with natural alternatives like baking soda and activated charcoal.
Brush your teeth with a mixture of essential oils, like peppermint and eucalyptus, for added freshness and benefits.
Utilize a toothbrush holder with built-in storage for additional toothbrushes, toothpaste, and floss.
Invest in a portable travel toothbrush and toothpaste for convenience when on the go.
Incorporate a daily dental hygiene routine that includes brushing, flossing, and using mouthwash.
